content.query:
select * from [dbo].[pool_table]

-- Lab - Partitioned Tables

SELECT FORMAT(Time,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS dt,COUNT(*) AS 'Number of Operations' FROM [dbo].[pool_table]
GROUP BY FORMAT(Time,'yyyy-MM-dd')

-- Let's drop the existing table if its exists
DROP TABLE [dbo].[pool_table]

-- Let's create a new table with partitions

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[pool_table]
(
	[CorrelationId] [varchar](200)  NULL,
	[OperationName] [varchar](200)  NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[EventCategory] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Time] [datetime]  NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200)  NULL,
	[EventInitiated by] [varchar](1000)  NULL,
	[ResourceType] [varchar](1000)  NULL,
	[ResourceGroup] [varchar](1000)  NULL,
	[Resource] [varchar](2000)  NULL
)
WITH  
(   
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH ([Operationname]),
    PARTITION ( [Time] RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES
            ('2023-01-01','2023-02-01','2023-03-01','2023-04-01'))
)

-- You will see 5 partitions , one is for those values prior to 2023-01-01
